titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, relating to the transportation of hazardous materials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/4/2000--Introduced. Amends Federal transportation law to exempt food and distilled spirits from the requirement that the Secretary of Transportation designate certain materials as hazardous when deciding that transporting them in commerce in a particular amount or form may pose an unreasonable risk to health and safety or property.
